decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement, Site Location Plan Received: 07 November 2013 9912/L Received: 14 November 2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall not be carried on outside the following times 08:00 - 21:00 Monday to Saturday and 09:00 - 18:00 on Sundays and Public Holidays.

Condition : 4 - In respect of any of the Class D1 use hereby approved, notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, as amended, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification; the use shall not be changed to a place of worship without further approval in writing from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Change of use of the property from existing office (B1 use) to proposed non-residential institution (D1 use)
